mapper.insert: INSERT Student (id,name, password, grade, email, departmentId, userType ) VALUES (#{id},#{name}, #{password}, #{grade}, #{email}, #{departmentId}, #{userType})
mapper.select: select count(*) from student where id = #{id};
select * from student where id = #{id} and email = #{email}
select * from student where id = #{id} and password = #{password}
